questionText: In "It's a Wonderful Life," what is the name of George Bailey's guardian angel?
In "Miracle on 34th Street," what is the name of the department store where Kris Kringle works?
In "A Christmas Carol," what is the first name of Scrooge's deceased business partner?
In "The Polar Express," what is written on the ticket that the boy receives?
In "National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation," what is the name of the Griswold family's next-door neighbor who gets his tree cut down?
In which country did the tradition of Christmas trees originate?
What was the original name of the poem that became "The Night Before Christmas"?
In what year was the first White House Christmas tree displayed?
What is the name of the reindeer that was originally named "Dunder" in the original "Night Before Christmas" poem?
In which century did the tradition of sending Christmas cards begin?
Who wrote the lyrics to "White Christmas"?
In "The Twelve Days of Christmas," what gift is given on the eighth day?
What is the original language of the carol "Silent Night"?
Who originally recorded "Jingle Bell Rock" in 1957?
In "The Nutcracker" ballet, what is the name of the main character who receives the nutcracker?
In what year were the first Winter Olympics held?
What is the term for a 360-degree spin in figure skating?
In curling, what is the name of the target area on the ice?
What is the maximum number of players on a bobsled team?
In skiing, what is the term for a turn where the skis are parallel throughout?
What is the main spice in traditional gingerbread cookies?
What is the name of the Italian Christmas cake traditionally eaten on Epiphany?
In which country did eggnog originate?
What is the name of the German Christmas bread that contains candied fruit and nuts?
What is the traditional number of courses in a Swedish Christmas smorgasbord?
Who wrote "How the Grinch Stole Christmas"?
In "A Christmas Carol," what are the names of the three ghosts that visit Scrooge?
answer: Ghost of Christmas Past, Present, and Yet to Come

questionText: What is the name of the main character in "The Gift of the Magi"?
In "The Nutcracker" story, who wrote the original tale that inspired the ballet?
What is the name of the collection of Christmas stories by Charles Dickens that includes "A Christmas Carol"?
